recipesJson.name: MMMM Twinkies
recipesJson.author: MarkSr
recipesJson.description: Pretty basic recipes of my version of a Hostess Twinkie.. Simple yet good..

reviews.text: I subbed cap golden butter with vt butter base......subbed inw shisha vanilla with vt vanilla cream......subbed sugar daddy with vt sweet mate.......subbed 000 sweet cream with tfa sweet cream.....subbed tpa whipped cream with tfa vanilla swirl. Off the shake and on the inhale I'm getting a soft cake and some sweetness, the exhale seems to be slightly creamy with remnants of cake, I'll give it the recommended 5 day steep then try again, but it's a pleasant light cake n cream at the moment. Definitely worth mixing.

This looks lovely! I'm looking at this as a nice "stone" recipe to build off to taste. For example I could add some Lemon,Banana, strawberry, chocolate or other yummyness to taste! Nice job Mark! :) Thank You!
